name: Zero G's Given
description:
Zero G's Given is an interactive zero gravity simulator where you play as a small robot and attempt to navigate through you're surroundings using various tools at your disposal. Developed for Global Game Jam 2021, find your way through a sprawling space station in search of tools to help you find your way around.

Programmers:

Gregory Johnson

Brendan Lindlbauer

Artists:

Harry Panourgias

Michael Hense
